lead_paragraph: Sooner or later Turkey must make up her mind which side she is on in the struggle raging all around her. The return of the German Ambassador to Ankara, after his conferences with Adolf Hitler, may precipitate that decision. No doubt he will bring tempting inducements for closer collaboration between Turkey and the Reich, and dire threats in the event the Turks prove difficult to convince.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
